name: Snowy the Snowman
description:
Welcome to Snowy the Snowman!

You play as a snowman traversing the snowy landscape. Avoid running into trees and falling off the sides! And try to collect as many carrots along the way!

Controls:

W - Increase forward speed

A - Move left

D - Move right

S - Decrease forward speed

This project was an exercise in completing the full cycle of game development from game idea to publication. I hope you enjoy it!
